title: Tatum Takes Down Nets in Thrilling Finish
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss all the great NBA action from this weekend. Nets had the Celtics on the ropes, but it was Tatum’s layup at the buzzer that was the deciding factor. Find out if the guys think the Nets are in trouble or if there will be a bounce back from the game 1 loss. Also, Kyrie has choice words and actions for Boston Celtics fans. Did he go too far or was his actions justified? Plus, the Timberwolves shock the Grizzlies behind great games from Anthony Edwards and Karl-Anthony Towns. What did the guys see about this Timberwolves team that impressed them the most. Also, Tyrese Maxey has a breakout game on the big stage. With Scottie Barnes out with injury, will the Raptors bounce back for game 2? All that and more.

itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
